biotools.summary: Cell4D is a Linux C++-based graphical spatial stochatic cell simulator capable of simulating a wide variety of cellular pathways. Molecules are simulated as particles within a user-defined simulation space under a Smoluchowski-based reaction-diffusion system on a static time-step basis.

bioschemas.name: Cell4D
